      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h2>Race $data.racenumber: Pitstop 1/3</h2>

<p>
<track seed='9999' bet='$data.bet' start='3' end='3'
            type='TEST' stage='PS' distance='$data.racedistance'
            dropout='$data.dropout'  carcolor='red'>
</p>

<br>

<table><tr><td bgcolor='$!data.voicecolor'><i>During these pit stops, you are asked for some information. Once you provide the information and 
click 'Continue', the race will start up 
again where it left off, and the cars will run until the next pit stop. In the pit stops, you are again asked to guess the 
likelihood of your car winning, and to indicate how confident you are that your guess is roughly right.  Please answer truthfully, using the 
sliding scales provided.  You will then be given the opportunity to drop out of the bet.  The earlier in the race you 
drop out, the more of your original bet you will retain; the later you drop out, the more of your original bet you will forfeit.  
If you wish to drop out, you need to tick the appropriate check box.  If you drop out, you will still need to 
watch the remainder of the race and participate in the pit-stop questions.  (Once again, your responses in this test race have no effect on anything.)
</i></td></tr></table>

<br>

<table><tr>
<td width="10%" valign='top' >
